set

public void set(int x_pos,
                int y_pos,
                java.lang.String name,
                java.lang.String id,
                int port,
                java.lang.String data)
Sets the Sensor with the following parameters:

Parameters:
x_pos - Position of the Sensor GUI in the x axis.
y_pos - Position of the Sensors GUI in the y axis.
name - Name of the Sensor.
id - Unique ID (UUID) of the Sensor.
port - Port of the Sensor.
data - Data of the Sensor.
Since:
27/06/2014.
